channel.title: Error npc disapear with nullpointer
channel.description:
I don't know why but my npc's have randomly just started dissapearing and not coming back for hours. It has happened quite often today, and i don't think i have added any updates recently that would do this. Where could i find the problem, and how can i fix it?
EDIT:
i found this: [img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/8241/3bb565d5b5044d48a116101.png[/img]
